event.title: Earlier this week, the Mayor of Boston declared

data.event: Earlier this week, the Mayor of Boston declared a "flu emergency" for the city, as 700 cases of the virus were reported.
However, a report released on Friday noted that 7.3% of deaths last week were a result of pneumonia and the flu.
However, a report released on Friday noted that 7.3% of deaths last week were a result of pneumonia and the flu.

event.title: the usual time of late January

data.event: These data indicate that seasonal flu has spread and reached high levels several weeks before the usual time of late January or February.

event.title: declared a state-wide public health emergency on Saturday

data.event: New York Governor Andrew M. Cuomo declared a state-wide public health emergency on Saturday.
